file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 28-12-02-06 - TANK VENT PLUMBING - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TANK VENT PLUMBING - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the inspection of the tank vent plumbing. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 28-12-02-200-801-A TANK VENT PLUMBING - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 28-12-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 28-12-02-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. TANK VENT PLUMBING - INSPECTION A. General (1) This task is done during the internal inspection of the fuel tanks. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-44-00/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM MPP 28-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 12-11-01-600-801-A/300 FUEL-TANK PRESSURE REFUELING - SERVICING AMM TASK 12-11-01-600-802-A/300 FUEL-TANK PRESSURE DEFUELING - SERVICING AMM TASK 28-11-01-000-801-A/400 FUEL-TANK ACCESS PANELS - REMOVAL AMM TASK 28-11-01-000-802-A/400 FUEL-TANK ACCESS PANELS - REMOVAL AMM TASK 28-11-01-400-801-A/400 FUEL-TANK ACCESS PANELS - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 28-11-01-400-802-A/400 FUEL-TANK ACCESS PANELS - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 541EB/541DB/541CB/541BB/541AB/531DB/531CB/ 500 LH Underwing surface 531BB/531AB 631AB/631BB/631CB/631DB/641AB/641BB/641CB/ 600 RH Underwing surface 641DB/641EB D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Fuel tanks EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 28-12-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 28-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) Defuel the tanks ( AMM TASK 12-11-01-600-802-A/300). (2) Remove the access panels ( AMM MPP 06-44-00/100) and ( AMM TASK 28-11-01-000-801-A/400) or (AMM TASK 28-11-01-000-802-A/400) as applicable, shown below to get access to the tank vent plumbing: (a) LH fuel tank: • 541EB/541DB/541CB/541BB/541AB/531DB/531CB/531BB/531AB. (b) RH fuel tank: • 631AB/631BB/631CB/631DB/641AB/641BB/641CB/641DB/641EB. J. Inspection Tank Vent Plumbing (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the tank vent plumbing for loose fittings and general condition. If necessary, replace or repair. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the access panels as shown below. Refer to AMM MPP 06-44-00/100 and AMM TASK 28-11-01-400-801-A/400 or AMM TASK 28-11-01-400-802-A/400 as applicable. (a) LH fuel tank: • 541EB/541DB/541CB/541BB/541AB/531DB/531CB/531BB/531AB. (b) RH fuel tank: • 631AB/631BB/631CB/631DB/641AB/641BB/641CB/641DB/641EB. (2) Refuel the aircraft ( AMM TASK 12-11-01-600-801-A/300) as applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 28-12-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
